message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is truly exceptional. Given its unique features and high quality, I am confident it will meet your needs and expectations. To make this opportunity more appealing, I would like to propose an initial price of $20000 for the product. This reflects not only its intrinsic value but also the potential benefits it could bring to you. Please let me know if this offer interests you, and we can discuss further details.

I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $15000. I'm really interested in the product, but I'm on a bit of a budget. I believe the product's value is worth a lot to me, but I'm not sure it's worth $20000. Can you consider a price reduction to $15000?
